video.title: Magi: The Kingdom of Magic
video.synopsis: After their recent victories in battle, Aladdin leaves the others to study magic but soon finds himself caught up in a new adventure.

episodes.synopsis: Aladdin and his friends are welcomed as heroes upon returning to Sindria, but their joy is overshadowed by Princess Dunya's troubling secret.
episodes.title: Premonition of a Journey

episodes.synopsis: Aladdin plans to study magic in Mangostadt, despite its connection to Al-Thamen. Sinbad spars with and befriends Kougyoku and Dunya grows weaker.
episodes.title: Departure

episodes.synopsis: Hakuryu and Morgiana join Aladdin on the first leg of his journey to Magnostadt, but he falls prey to pirates after they say their farewells.
episodes.title: Setting Sail

episodes.synopsis: Hakuryu, Morgiana and Alibaba set out to rescue Aladdin, who's been abducted by Orba and his pirates on his journey to Magnostadt.
episodes.title: Pirates

episodes.synopsis: While Alibaba, Hakuryu and Morgiana fight an army of children, Aladdin falls under Madaura's spell, which summons images of his long-lost mother.
episodes.title: Mother

episodes.synopsis: The Actian Navy captures Madaura and her band of pirate children, while Hakuryu, freed from his brainwashing, sets out to find his mother.
episodes.title: A Kind Person

episodes.synopsis: After a farewell party, Aladdin says goodbye to Alibaba and Morgiana, unaware of the surprises the next leg of his journey has in store.
episodes.title: Ren Kouha Appears

episodes.synopsis: Aladdin finally arrives at Magnostadt Academy, where he soon discovers that he'll need more than ambition to pass the grueling entrance exams.
episodes.title: Days of Training

episodes.synopsis: Alibaba arrives at the Leam Empire ready to train as a gladiator, but a fateful first challenge may rule him out before he even begins.
episodes.title: The Leam Empire

episodes.synopsis: Alibaba is finally allowed to train as a gladiator, but his first bout in the Colosseum is against the giant ape Garda ... and no magic is allowed!
episodes.title: The High Priestess

episodes.synopsis: Morgiana faces a perilous decision when she returns to her homeland, Katarg, to find that her people have resettled across the Great Rift.
episodes.title: The Great Rift

episodes.synopsis: As the Kou Empire's heirs wonder who will be the new emperor, many believe it will be Kouen, but a new will emerges that changes everything.
episodes.title: A New Emperor

episodes.synopsis: When eccentric Titus Alexius is named top student over expected No. 1 graduate Aladdin, a magic showdown unfolds between the two.
episodes.title: Titus Alexius

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of their magic battle, Titus and Aladdin become friends and set out with Sphintus to find out more about Magnostadt.
episodes.title: The Hidden Citizens

episodes.synopsis: Aladdin, Titus and Sphintus are caught wandering in the 5th Level Authorization District and brought before Mogamett.
episodes.title: The Magicians' Country

episodes.synopsis: Mogamett's tale of the past wins over most of the students, but a dubious Aladdin still believes that Mogamett has ties to Al-Thamen.
episodes.title: Remaining Life

episodes.synopsis: Titus reveals that he's a clone of Scheherazade, and Magnostadt is brought to the brink of war with the Leam Empire.
episodes.title: Declaration of War

episodes.synopsis: Led by Scheherazade, the Leam Empire descends on Magnostadt, unprepared for the magicians' powerful defense.
episodes.title: Leam's Threat

episodes.synopsis: When Aladdin turns his Magi powers against the Fanali Corps to defend Magnostadt, a challenge from Mu puts his skills to the ultimate test.
episodes.title: A True Magi

episodes.synopsis: Aladdin makes a last stand against the Leam army, but Mu redoubles his efforts in an attempt to dominate Magnostadt once and for all.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Lord Mogamett isn't troubled by the impending invasion of Magnostadt by the Leam and the Kou, but will the goi lay down their lives as he expects?
episodes.title: The King's Candidate

episodes.synopsis: The Dark Djinns regain strength and attack the Leam fleet. Meanwhile, Titus wrestles with how best to expend his remaining energies.
episodes.title: What You Want To Protect

episodes.synopsis: With the White Rukh in danger of being depleted, Aladdin fears for the future of the world and makes a fateful agreement with Kouen.
episodes.title: The Djinn Warriors

episodes.synopsis: When the medium evolves into a monstrous humanoid that absorbs White Rukh from all that it touches, Aladdin and Alibaba get some unexpected allies.
episodes.title: Time of Destruction

episodes.synopsis: The final battle explodes in Magnostadt; as the medium grows stronger, Mu rallies forces from Leam, and Aladdin discovers a key to triumph.
episodes.title: Welcome Home
